Level - Class in crazyballrun.game.level
The Level class contains all necessary information for playing on a map.

Creates an instance of Level.

File extension of the level-files.
LEVEL_RESOURCE_PATH - Static variable in class crazyballrun.game.GameConstants
Path leading to the level-files of the game.
LevelDescription - Class in crazyballrun.game.level
The LevelDescription class used for the level description shown in the GUI (pre-information of the level, like author, level name, textual and visual level description, ...).
LevelDescription() - Constructor for class crazyballrun.game.level.LevelDescription
 
LevelDescriptionParser - Class in crazyballrun.game.level
The LevelDescriptionParser is a "pre-parser" for the LevelParser.
LevelDescriptionParser() - Constructor for class crazyballrun.game.level.LevelDescriptionParser
 
LevelEngine - Class in crazyballrun.game.level
The LevelEngine undertakes the task to pre-load all available level-descriptions when the game starts.
LevelObject - Class in crazyballrun.game.level.objects
This abstract class defines basic functionality of static and moving objects in a level.
LevelObject() - Constructor for class crazyballrun.game.level.objects.LevelObject
Constructor of LevelObject.
LevelObject.ObjectState - Enum in crazyballrun.game.level.objects
All possible state of a level object.
LevelObjectFactory - Class in crazyballrun.game.level.objects
The LevelObjectFactory generates instances of different LevelObject- implementations.
LevelObjectFactory() - Constructor for class crazyballrun.game.level.objects.LevelObjectFactory
 
LevelObjectParser - Class in crazyballrun.game.level.objects
The LevelObjectParser reads an XML-file and extracts all necessary information from it to create a valid instance LevelObject.
LevelObjectParser() - Constructor for class crazyballrun.game.level.objects.LevelObjectParser
Constructor of the LevelObjectParser.
LevelParser - Class in crazyballrun.game.level
The LevelParser parses an XML-file which specifies level-specific data (map texturing, objects on the map, player positions, goals, etc.).
LevelParser() - Constructor for class crazyballrun.game.level.LevelParser
Constructor of the LevelParser.
loadLevel(String) - Method in class crazyballrun.game.level.LevelEngine
Loads the specified level and starts the game.
loadObject(String) - Method in class crazyballrun.game.level.LevelEngine
Loads an object from the global object-directory.
loadObject(String, String) - Method in class crazyballrun.game.level.LevelEngine
Loads an object for a particular level.
log(Exception) - Static method in class crazyballrun.game.GameLogger
Writes a log-entry for a caught exception into the logfile.
log(String) - Static method in class crazyballrun.game.GameLogger
Writes a log-entry into the logfile.
LOG_FILE_PATH - Static variable in class crazyballrun.game.GameConstants
